Name: Verify Adding Items to Shopping Basket and Navigating through Pages
Description: Navigate to the home page and login. Add items to the shopping basket and navigate through various pages. Finally, verify the product page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink recommended
step 4: At Page home, click on hyperlink recommended > navigate to Page recommended
step 5: At Page recommended, click on img object
step 6: At Page recommended, click on img object > navigate to Page product
step 7: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 8: At Page product, click on hyperlink home
step 9: At Page product, click on hyperlink home > navigate to Page home
step 10: At Page home, click on hyperlink see all
step 11: At Page home, click on hyperlink see all > navigate to Page recommended
step 12: At Page recommended, click on h5 object
step 13: At Page recommended, click on h5 object
step 14: At Page recommended, click on hyperlink view account
step 15: At Page recommended, click on hyperlink view account > navigate to Page account
step 16: At Page account, click on li object
step 17: At Page account, click on li object
step 18: At Page account, click on li object
step 19: At Page account, click on li object
step 20: At Page account, click on hyperlink shop
step 21: At Page account, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page shop
step 22: At Page shop, click on h5 object
step 23: At Page shop, click on h5 object > navigate to Page product
step 24: Add visual checkpoint at Page product

Name: Verify Account Profile Editing and Adding Items to Basket
Description: Navigate to the product page and login. Access the signup and signin pages. Edit the account profile and add items to the basket. Verify the account edit page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page  product
step 2: At Page product login > navigate to Page product
step 3: At Page product, click on hyperlink sign up > navigate to Page signup
step 4: At Page signup, click on hyperlink sign in > navigate to Page signin
step 5: At Page signin, input on input email > navigate to Page home
step 6: At Page home, click on h2 object > navigate to Page product
step 7: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 8: At Page product, click on div object
step 9: At Page product, click on hyperlink view account > navigate to Page account
step 10: At Page account, click on button edit account > navigate to Page account edit
step 11: At Page account edit, click on input fullname
step 12: At Page account edit, input on input fullname
step 13: At Page account edit, click on input email
step 14: At Page account edit, input on input email
step 15: At Page account edit, click on input object
step 16: At Page account edit, input on input object
step 17: At Page account edit, click on button update profile
step 18: Add visual checkpoint at Page account edit

Name: Verify Shopping and Sign In to Checkout
Description: Navigate to the home page and proceed to shopping. Sign in to checkout and verify the shop page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on h2 object > navigate to Page product
step 3: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 4: At Page product, click on svg object
step 5: At Page product, click on button check out
step 6: At Page product, click on button sign in to checkout > navigate to Page signin
step 7: At Page signin login > navigate to Page signin
step 8: At Page signin login > navigate to Page home
step 9: At Page home, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page shop
step 10: Add visual checkpoint at Page shop

Name: Verify Checkout Process with Address and Payment Information
Description: Navigate to the home page and add items to the basket. Proceed to checkout and enter address and payment information. Verify the checkout page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on h2 object > navigate to Page product
step 4: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 5: At Page product, click on button 1
step 6: At Page product, click on button check out > navigate to Page checkout
step 7: At Page checkout, click on button next step
step 8: At Page checkout, click on input fullname
step 9: At Page checkout, input on input fullname
step 10: At Page checkout, click on input address
step 11: At Page checkout, input on input address
step 12: At Page checkout, click on input email
step 13: At Page checkout, input on input email
step 14: At Page checkout, click on input object
step 15: At Page checkout, input on input object
step 16: At Page checkout, click on div object
step 17: At Page checkout, click on button next step
step 18: Add visual checkpoint at Page checkout

Name: Verify Search for Herringbone on Featured Page
Description: Navigate to the featured page and login. Search for Herringbone and verify the search results page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page  featured
step 2: At Page featured login > navigate to Page featured
step 3: At Page featured, click on input object > navigate to Page search herringbone
step 4: Add visual checkpoint at Page search herringbone

Name: Verify Signing In from Product Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and login. Access the product page and sign in. Verify the sign-in page.

step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on h2 object > navigate to Page product
step 4: At Page product, click on img object
step 5: At Page product, click on h6 object > navigate to Page signin
step 6: Add visual checkpoint at Page signin
